after: ^As you watch the bandits scatter, the lumberjack exits his cabin and looks at you.
^"Thank you for taking care of them, but I'm afraid it wasn't the last time I saw them. The name is Andrey."
Name: ^"Great, now that we have pleasantries out of the way, tell me what made you come here."
ev
str
/str
/ev

s: ^"I was sent by a blacksmith to check up on you."

c-0: ^"So the old man sends you. I guess he wants this."
^He gives you the box full of wood.
^"Go and give it to him. And be careful; there are more of these bandits in the woods. I just hope someone will take care of them for good."

s: ^"I'll see what I can do about that. See you around."
